parameters.name: Relation1
parameters.description: Relation as defined in swConstraintType_e for the first selection to position the 3D sketch plane

parameters.name: Relation2
parameters.description: Relation as defined in swConstraintType_e for the second selection to position the 3D sketch plane

parameters.name: Relation3
parameters.description: Relation as defined in swConstraintType_e for the third selection to position the 3D sketch plane

title: ISketchManager.CreateSketchPlane
signature:
System.Boolean CreateSketchPlane( 
   System.Int32
Relation1
,
   System.Int32
Relation2
,
   System.Int32
Relation3
)

parameters.name: Relation1
parameters.description: Relation as defined in swConstraintType_e for the first selection to position the 3D sketch plane

parameters.name: Relation2
parameters.description: Relation as defined in swConstraintType_e for the second selection to position the 3D sketch plane

parameters.name: Relation3
parameters.description: Relation as defined in swConstraintType_e for the third selection to position the 3D sketch plane

returns: True if the 3D sketch plane is created, false if not
remarks: This method gets the selected items from the selection list in the order in which they were selected and applies the specified relation to them. If fewer than three items were selected, then only the first, or first and second, values are used.
